name: Twitter API v2
description: Access Twitter's full range of data including tweets, users, lists, trends, and more. Perfect for social media monitoring and automated engagement.
useCase: Auto-tweet weather-triggered offers, monitor brand mentions

name: OpenWeatherMap
description: Current weather data, forecasts, and historical weather information for any location worldwide. Trigger location-based marketing campaigns.
useCase: Send 'Rainy Day' promos to your SMS/email list

name: Stripe Payments
description: Complete payment processing with support for subscriptions, invoices, and marketplace functionality. Automate post-payment workflows.
useCase: Auto-send welcome emails after first payment, trigger reward flows

name: YouTube Data API
description: Access YouTube videos, channels, playlists, and comments. Build content discovery tools and automated video marketing campaigns.
useCase: Build auto-updating 'Trending in [Niche]' newsletters

name: Google Analytics 4
description: Advanced web analytics data including user behavior, conversion tracking, and custom events. Build real-time growth dashboards.
useCase: Real-time cohort analysis to trigger popups for at-risk users

name: Mailchimp Marketing
description: Email marketing automation with advanced segmentation, A/B testing, and performance analytics. Scale your email growth hacks.
useCase: Auto-add users from leadgen forms & trigger hyper-personalized flows

name: Instagram Graph API
description: Access Instagram business accounts, media, insights, and messaging. Automate Instagram marketing and engagement campaigns.
useCase: Auto-message contest participants, schedule viral content

name: Reddit API
description: Access Reddit posts, comments, user profiles, and subreddit data. Monitor trends and automate community engagement.
useCase: Auto-DM new commenters with lead magnets, monitor trending topics

name: Clearbit Enrichment
description: Company and person data enrichment API. Get detailed information about leads including company size, revenue, and tech stack.
useCase: Personalize cold emails with company size, LinkedIn, tech stack

name: OpenAI GPT-4
description: Advanced AI language model for content generation, code completion, and intelligent automation. Scale your content creation.
useCase: AI-written LinkedIn comments at scale, auto-personalized responses

name: Unsplash Photos
description: High-quality stock photos with powerful search and collection features. Auto-rotate hero images for A/B testing campaigns.
useCase: Auto-rotate hero images by day or campaign, dynamic content

name: Hunter.io Email Finder
description: Find and verify professional email addresses. Built for B2B outreach and lead generation at scale.
useCase: Bulk scrape & outreach for growth campaigns, lead enrichment

name: Calendly Scheduling
description: Automated scheduling with calendar integration. Trigger post-conversion onboarding flows and sales calls.
useCase: Trigger post-signup onboarding call invites, automated booking

name: Bitly URL Shortener
description: URL shortening with click tracking and analytics. Create trackable links for viral campaigns and growth experiments.
useCase: Unique link for every lead/referral, viral campaign tracking

name: LinkedIn Marketing
description: Access LinkedIn's professional network for B2B marketing, lead generation, and professional content distribution.
useCase: Automated B2B outreach, professional network growth hacking

name: Twilio SMS
description: Programmable SMS, voice, and video communications. Build automated customer engagement and notification systems.
useCase: Weather-triggered SMS campaigns, automated follow-ups

name: Shopify Admin API
description: Complete e-commerce platform API for products, orders, customers, and inventory management. Automate store operations.
useCase: Automated inventory alerts, personalized product recommendations

name: Airtable
description: Flexible database API that combines spreadsheet simplicity with database power. Perfect for managing growth experiment data.
useCase: Lead scoring automation, growth experiment tracking

name: GitHub API
description: Access repositories, issues, pull requests, and developer activity. Build developer-focused growth tools and automations.
useCase: Developer onboarding automation, code-based lead generation

name: Slack Web API
description: Build Slack bots and integrations for team communication and workflow automation. Perfect for internal growth tools.
useCase: Growth metric alerts, team engagement automation
